name: IoT app mobile and tablet
description: Application to control IoT devices lighting, music, security and water pump. Designed to embed a tablet and control the devices. Also alerts about low levels in reserves or high levels of consumption as well as timers if something is left on for a long time. Sensors could also be added to determine if the oven was somehow left on or there are gas leaks. For the configuration of the plan, a web application would be made where the user would register and could generate his plan as well as add his elements. Cover for figma based on dribble design.
